Title: Mahou no Princess Minky Momo: Yume wo Dakishimete
Description: ["After the events of the 1st series, Fenarinarsa continues to drift from Earth, so the King asks for help from the kingdom, Marinarsa, to send their daughter, Momo (Who is identical to the 1st one) to Earth to regain humanity's faith in their dreams. "]
Staff: [['Yuyama, Kunihiko', 'Director, Storyboard, Screenplay'], ['Kato, Takao', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Fujimoto, Yoshitaka', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Watanabe, Hiroshi', 'Episode Director, Storyboard, Character Design, Animation Director']]
